channel.title: How do i stop the password change on 508's
channel.description:
im new to 508's so if this is somthing stupid and easy sorry =/ everytime i log in and log out it changes my password so i cant log in again... everytime i have to go to the char folder and delete my account and start over...
one more thing...
how do i make myself admin again lol i forgot how rofl :D

item.title: How do i stop the password change on 508's
item.dc:creator: @llaver llaver
item.description:
@llaver wrote:

[quote=“Pure str433, post:2, topic:258040”]Client.java > ctrl+f "changepass"
or whatever the command it
and just delete that.[/quote]

what u mean?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i stop the password change on 508's

item.title: How do i stop the password change on 508's
item.dc:creator: @Gods_army Gods army
item.description:
@Gods_army wrote:

he’s an idiot mopar… he was telling a 317… and no mopar wrong yet again… HIS PASSWORD not username.

item.title: How do i stop the password change on 508's
item.dc:creator: @moparclient moparclient
item.description:
@moparclient wrote:

For admin

Characters > YOUR CHARA > Player Rights 2 or 3

you wnna reset his character? ok

the real way is in login.java

seatch for the real owner of the server like palyi

Read full topic

item.title: How do i stop the password change on 508's
item.dc:creator: @Pure_str433 Pure str433
item.description:
@Pure_str433 wrote:

Client.java > ctrl+f "changepass"
or whatever the command it
and just delete that.

For admin

Characters > YOUR CHARA > Player Rights 2 or 3
